ValidationRule.description: There are 4 roles that are used within the Apex trigger and as such should not be changed under any circumstances
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND( ISCHANGED(Name), PRIORVALUE(Name) = "Commercial Manufacturing Manager" ), AND( ISCHANGED(Name), PRIORVALUE(Name) = "Residential Product Manager" ), AND( ISCHANGED(Name), PRIORVALUE(Name) = "Commercial Product Manager" ), AND( ISCHANGED(Name), PRIORVALUE(Name) = "Regional Manufacturing Manager" )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This role name cannot be changed or it will impact the email distribution
